testimonials.feedback: Adding Kiki's empanadas to our menu was a game-changer. Easy to prepare and our customers love them!
testimonials.author: Danny, Bar Owner

testimonials.feedback: The variety of flavors means there's something for everyone. They've become a favorite at our restaurant.
testimonials.author: Lisa, Restaurant Manager

cta.title: Ready to Delight Your Customers?
cta.subtitle: Contact us to place your wholesale order today.

faqs.question: What are the storage requirements for the frozen empanadas?
faqs.answer: Our empanadas should be stored in a freezer at 0°F (-18°C) until ready to prepare.

faqs.question: How long do the frozen empanadas take to prepare?
faqs.answer: From frozen, the empanadas typically take about 20-25 minutes to bake in a conventional oven.
